author: Reba

review: I have been using the Amazon Fire TV for about a month and am very satisfied. Easily connects to TV via HDMI and network via Ethernet. I didn't use Wireless as my router is only a few feet away. I have used to watch Netflix and WWE Network along with several MLB games. There have been a few streaming issues mostly with Netflix but I believe it's not a Fire TV issue.  The remote is a little small as I have large hands but easy enough to operate. It works even from another room or pointing in opposite direction of unit. I don't use the voice option too much but it does work without issue.  It doesn't have an on/off switch but it's not needed as the unit turns itself off appx 30 minutes of no use. Press any button to turn back on when ready.  Overall I am very satisfied with this and along with subscriptions I already have, it is awesome. Very glad I made this purchase.
